item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me # I am a software engineer and entrepreneur from Toronto, Canada. I studied mechatronics engineering at the University of Waterloo and founded phonic.ai. Elsewhere # daveferbear on Github

item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: Bookshelf # Biographies & Autobiographies # Disturbing the Universe by Freeman Dyson Steve Jobs by Walter Isaacson Einstein: His Life and Universe by Walter Isaacson Math & Science # The Information: A History, a Theory, a Flood by James Gleick Chaos: Making a New Science by James Gleick Technology + Culture # The Age of Surveillance Capitalism by Shoshana Zuboff Fiction # Dune
